Classes in iris.imageToBitcode used by iris.database
BitCode
          A class that stores a bitcode and makes it easy to add one bit at a time

GaborParameters
           
 

Classes in iris.imageToBitcode used by unittest.ImageToBitcode
BitcodeGenerator
          A class that uses Gabor filters to generate a bitcode from an image of an iris The basic idea is to create different Gabor wavelets, defined by the constants a,b,w,x0 and y0 and filter the unwrapped iris with those wavelets.
